description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useRecipes' that manages recipe search functionality, including state for query, recipes, loading, and error, and performs API calls to fetch recipes based on a search query.

methods.name: useRecipes(initialQuery = '')
methods.description: Custom React hook for managing recipe search state and performing API calls.

methods.name: performSearch
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches recipes based on a query and updates state accordingly.
